name: Carlos - The Dog.
description:
Carlos, the dog, sleeps next to his owner while a gang of evildoers invades the house where they live. As soon as Carlos hears that the house has been invaded he checks if its owner is still sleeping and enters combat mode and has a mission: To finish off all invaders and allow its owner to continue sleeping peacefully.

— DATE 

March 2019

 — DEVELOPMENT TEAM 

Me(Producer, Programmer) 

Vitor Rodrigues (3D Artist) 

Alberto Gregório(2D Artist) 

The build itself is just a few of the mechanics of the final game. Developed while following the GTGD 3 tutorials.

The project is in Portuguese.
